articles.title: Governments support stripped-down corporate due diligence law - Euronews
articles.description: After weeks of uncertainty, new EU rules on sustainable supply chains seem likely to pass into law. #EuropeNews
articles.content:
After weeks of uncertainty, new EU rules on sustainable supply chains seem likely to pass into law.
 EU member states on Friday (15 March) have voted in favour of a landmark new law requiring compan… [+1958 chars]
